name: Goldilocks and the three bears - Book & Games (Lite)
name_original: Goldilocks and the three bears - Book & Games (Lite)
description:
Goldilocks and the three bears is a wonderful storybook multilingual, illustrated by Michelle Katherine Martin, with text and narrations that your kids will love.
This is the "lite" version, so you will find the first pages of the book, and if you like it, the book can be purchased within the app.

Two games are included, a Memory Match & Jigsaw puzzle, your kids will have lots of fun.

Features:

1) Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
2) Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
3) Several languages supported: English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian and German.
4) Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
5) Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
6) A fun and challenging Memory Match game to increase your children's brain activity.
7) A Jigsaw puzzle game to have even more fun.

Enjoy.
